sentences.sContent: ...When the researchers repeated the laboratory experiment on the second and third nights they found the left hemisphere could not be stimulated in the same way during deep sleep...
...Morgan’s comments on outsourcing mark the second time this month that he has come out against one of Haslam’s plans for higher education in Tennessee...
...before you then put it into the second language...
...anything goes mode of child-rearing that became popular in the second half of the 20th century...
...What does Martin Neil Baily think of a second stimulus to the economy...
...So we expect that the second part of the year would not be very good in terms of wage growth...
...Baily says it would make a strong case for a second stimulus—something the Obama administration hopes will not be necessary...
...South Korea opened its second Antarctic research base in 2014...
...It is building its second ice-breaking ship and setting up research drilling operations on an ice dome...
...Hackers then sold the data to a second group of criminals operating in shadowy corners of the web...
Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.sCn: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

phrases.pCn: （大学考试成绩）二等；二等舱；二流；（美）二等邮件（定期期刊等）
居第二位的；仅次于最好的

words.tran: 第二的；中等的；次要的；中级的
在其次；在第二，在第二位

trans.tranOther: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting
